extendedInfo.description: 2 in 1. Sliding puzzle and Memory cards games.Fun for kids or for whoever likes sport cars.SLIDING PUZZLE board game featuring 5 super cars images, and 3 difficulty levelsTraditional sliding puzzle board game for your Android device. Game is really simple - recompose image by sliding puzzle tiles. However, you will be challenged with great hi-res image selection, various puzzle sizes and difficulty levels.Help button show initial image, but will increase game time for 5 sec.This game is highly recommended to all fans of slide puzzle!Features:* 5 available HD images to solve.* 3 difficulty levels, 3 puzzle sizes: 4x4 (16-tile), 6x5 (30-tile) and 8x6 (48-tile) games* save solved image as wallpaperA MEMORY CARDS game for kids, but you grown-ups may find yourselves struggling to beat your kids' times in matching all the pairs.The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cars. It's easy. Tap to flip two cards. Match a pair and they stay open. But flip quickly ... the clock is ticking.* 3 difficulty levels, board size: 4x4 (16- cards), 6x4 (24-cards) and 7x4 (28-cards)* 14 different carsThis games is optimized for 800x480px screen resolution, but should work fine on other screens.Keywords:kids game, cars game, child, son, boy, funny game, kids memory, memory for kids, memory trainingPlease Email with any issues or suggestions
